name: aws-kb-retrieval
description: AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base retrieval and RAG capabilities. Query AWS-managed knowledge bases with semantic search, vector embeddings, and enterprise-grade document retrieval.

prerequisites.description: Requires Node.js 18+, AWS credentials, and an AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base
steps: Configure AWS credentials (aws configure or environment variables)
Create AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base in your AWS account
Note your Knowledge Base ID and AWS region
